Name: Age Line

Name: Bubble-producing spell
Effect: Creates a stream of non-bursting bubbles

Name: Seize and Pull Charm
Effect: Pull caster towards object, Pull object towards caster

Effect: Makes opponent stumble, Causes sharp pain

Name: Homing spell
Effect: Offensive spells; will follow their target

Name: Freezing Charm
Effect: Stops movement and actions of the target

Effect: Sticks tongue to roof of the mouth

Effect: Lets caster see into the mind of another person

Effect: Causes weather effects caused by incantations to cease

Effect: Sucks the target into the ground

Light: Invisible on its own, reflects light of spell
Effect: Reflects spells and blocks physical forces

Name: Pus-squirting hex
Effect: Causes yellowish goo to squirt from one's nose

Effect: Reverses the effects of an incomplete Transformation spell

Name: Repello Inimicum
Effect: Repels enemies. If used with Protego Maxima and Fianto Duri, it disintegrates anything that comes in contact with the barrier.

Name: Revelio Charm
Effect: Reveals secrets about a person or object

Name: Boggart-Banishing Spell
Effect: Turns a Boggart into something amusing

Name: Skurge Charm

Name: Sonorous Charm
Effect: Emits a magnified roar from the tip of the wand

Name: Specialis Revelio
Effect: Reveals spells cast on objects or potions

Name: Taboo

Name: Teapot to tortoise
